delete_question: Are you sure you want to delete this question?
delete_page: Are you sure you want to delete this page?
err_duplicate_priority_group_items: Those items are present in more than one priority Group: {{iterms}}
err_duplicate_random_group_items: Those items are present in more than one random group: {{items}}
err_empty_parent: This {{component_name}} cannot be empty, Please add at least one {{child_name}}
err_misplaced_end_group: End Page must always be the last page
err_misplaced_welcome_group: Welcome Page must always be the first page
err_no_end_group: There must be an valid end page
err_priority_group_item_not_child: Those items are either deleted or have errors and therefore cannot be in Priority Group: {{items}}
err_priority_limit_mismatch: In one of the priority groups, the limit is more than or equal to number of items
err_random_group_item_not_child: Those items are either deleted or have errors and therefore cannot be in Random Group: {{items}}
err_reference: Error: piping a value of missing or a trailing question: {{codes}}, in Language: {{lang}}
err_skip: Problem with one of the skip instructions
err_value_in_end_group: Cannot have questions that capture user input in End Group
value_beyond_bounds: invalid value for {{label}}, must be between {{lower_bound}} and {{upper_bound}}, actual value is: {{setup_value}}
hide_text: Show only the icons or images without labels.
invalid_skip_destination_err: {{code}} is not a valid Skip Destination...
no_logic_err: ❌ Without Logic, this will be reset to Always Show
question: Question
show_description: Add a description under the question title to give users context or instructions.
show_description_page: Add a description under the page title to give users context or instructions.
show_question_hint: Add a subtle tip below the question for extra clarity.
wrong_logic_err: ❌ There was an error in Logic therefore this was reset to Always Show

tooltips.is_randomized: Is part of a valid Random Group (within parent)
tooltips.is_prioritized: Is part of a valid Priority Group (within parent)
tooltips.group: Add a new page to organize your survey into sections
tooltips.number: Collect numeric input like age or quantity
tooltips.scq: Let users select one option from a list
tooltips.select: Let users select one option from a dropdown menu
tooltips.icon_scq: Let users select one option using icons
tooltips.image_scq: Let users select one option using images
tooltips.scq_array: Rate multiple items with one choice per row
tooltips.mcq_array: Rate multiple items with multiple choices per row
tooltips.scq_icon_array: Rate multiple items visually using icons
tooltips.date_time: Collect both date and time together
tooltips.image_display: Show an image for context or clarity
tooltips.video_display: Show a video to support your content
tooltips.barcode: Scan barcodes using a mobile device or tablet (offline mode)
tooltips.photo_capture: Take and upload photos directly (offline mode)
tooltips.video_capture: Record and upload short videos (offline mode)
tooltips.ranking: Rank different texts in order of preference
tooltips.file_upload: Upload files like documents or images
tooltips.show_word_count: Show word count to the user
tooltips.show_question_hint: Show question hint to the user
tooltips.text_field_size: Set the number of characters allowed in the text field
tooltips.decimal_separator: Set the decimal separator for numeric input
tooltips.lower_bound_hint: Display a helpful hint on lowest value to guide responses
tooltips.upper_bound_hint: Display a helpful hint on highest value to guide responses
tooltips.date_format: Set the date format for date input
tooltips.max_date: Set the maximum date for date input
tooltips.min_date: Set the minimum date for date input
tooltips.fullday_format: Set if you want to show the full day or not
tooltips.order_mode: Set the order mode for the survey
tooltips.hide_text: Set if you want the text to be hidden
tooltips.columns_number: Set how many options appear per row.
tooltips.image_icon_size: Define the pixel size for the icons within the question.
tooltips.spacing: Set the space between options in the question.
tooltips.image_aspect_ratio: Set the aspect ratio for the image
tooltips.image_width: Adjust how wide the image appears within the question.
tooltips.relevance:
Control when this page or question is visible. You can:

● Always show it
● Show it only when specific conditions are met

Conditions can be based on:

● Survey mode (online/offline)
● Survey language
● Answers to previous questions
● Whether another question or page is shown or valid

Add multiple conditions to customize the flow for each respondent.
tooltips.validation_required: Make this question mandatory before users can continue.
tooltips.validation_max_char_length: Limit the number of characters a user can enter.
tooltips.validation_min_char_length: Set the minimum number of characters required in the answer.
tooltips.validation_pattern: Validate answers using a regular expression pattern.
tooltips.validation_contains: Ensure the response includes a specific word or phrase.
tooltips.validation_not_contains: Ensure the response does not include a specific word or phrase.
tooltips.validation_between: Accept only answers within a defined numeric range.
tooltips.validation_not_between: Exclude answers that fall within a specific range.
tooltips.validation_lt: Only accept numbers lower than a set value.
tooltips.validation_lte: Accept numbers equal to or lower than a set value.
tooltips.validation_gt: Only accept numbers higher than a set value.
tooltips.validation_gte: Accept numbers equal to or higher than a set value.
tooltips.validation_not_equal: Exclude a specific number from being entered.
tooltips.validation_max_word_count: Limit the number of options a user can choose.
tooltips.validation_min_word_count: Require users to select at least a certain number of options.
tooltips.validation_pattern_email: Check that the input matches a standard email format.
tooltips.validation_one_response_per_col: Ensure only one answer can be selected per column.
tooltips.validation_min_option_count: Set the minimum number of options that should be selected
tooltips.validation_max_option_count: Set the maximum number of options that should be selected
tooltips.validation_option_count: Force users to select exactly the specified number of options.
tooltips.validation_max_file_size: Set the largest file size allowed for uploads (in MB).
tooltips.validation_min_ranking_count: Require a minimum number of ranked items to complete the question.
tooltips.validation_max_ranking_count: Limit how many items the user can rank.
tooltips.validation_ranking_count: Set an exact number of items the user must rank.
tooltips.validation_file_types: Specify which file types users can upload.
tooltips.options_order: Set the order of the options
tooltips.options_priority: Set the priority of the options
tooltips.rows_order: Choose the display order of rows—as is, random, flipped, or custom.
tooltips.rows_priority: Assign weights to prioritize rows in the question.
tooltips.columns_order: Choose the display order of columns—as is, random, flipped, or custom.
tooltips.columns_priority: Assign weights to prioritize columns in the question.
tooltips.min_header_mobile: Set the minimum width for header columns on mobile devices to ensure proper display.
tooltips.min_header_desktop: Set the minimum width for header columns on desktop devices to ensure proper display.
tooltips.min_row_label_mobile: Set the minimum width for row label columns on mobile devices to ensure proper display.
tooltips.min_row_label_desktop: Set the minimum width for row label columns on desktop devices to ensure proper display.
tooltips.questions_order:
Questions Order: Control how questions appear on this page:

○  As is: Displays questions in their default order. 
○  Random Order: Randomly shuffle the selected questions. 
○  Flip Order: Reverses the question sequence.
○  Custom: Create custom rules to randomly display only a subset of selected questions.
tooltips.questions_priority:
Use this to assign priorities and limit how many questions are shown.
Select questions and assign them priority weights—Qlarr will sample based on these weights and the number of questions you choose to show.
tooltips.groups_order: Set the order of the groups
tooltips.groups_priority: Set the priority of the groups
tooltips.title: Provide a title for your survey to help users identify it
tooltips.description: Provide a description for your survey to help users understand it
tooltips.textarea_lines: Set the number of lines for the text area
tooltips.disabled: Completely hide this question so respondents cannot see or interact with it. Any visibility conditions will be cleared.
tooltips.allow_previous: Allow respondents to navigate back to previous pages to review or change their answers.
tooltips.allow_jump: Enable a survey index so respondents can jump to any page in the survey.
tooltips.allow_incomplete: Let respondents save their progress and return later to complete the survey.
tooltips.skip_invalid: Allow respondents to proceed even if some answers are invalid, enforcing validation only when they submit the survey.
